Uses of Package
jchess.gamelogic

Packages that use jchess.gamelogic 
Package Description
jchess.gamelogic  
  • Classes in jchess.gamelogic used by jchess.gamelogic 
    Class Description
    IGame  
    IGameListener
    This facilitates linked classes to call GamePersenter methods.
    IGameState
    This provides abstraction to the current state of the data.
    PieceAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Piece" (only) related data.
    PositionAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Position" (only) related data.
    RuleAgent
    This class is responsible to manage underlying "Rule" (only) related data.
